thread.title: Possible global variant of the Nokia 6 gets certified in Taiwan
thread.title_full: Possible global variant of the Nokia 6 gets certified in Taiwan

title: Possible global variant of the Nokia 6 gets certified in Taiwan
text:
Possible global variant of the Nokia 6 gets certified in Taiwan Possible global variant of the Nokia 6 gets certified in Taiwan By   Nokia 6’s international model is expected to launch later this month at MWC” 
Earlier this year, the alleged global variant of the Nokia 6 smartphone with model number TA-1003 was spotted on the Bluetooth certification website. Now the same device has been certified in Taiwan. 
The Nokia 6 variant certified in Taiwan supports LTE, CDMA and GSM, which makes it compatible with networks across the globe. The specs of the device are similar to the Chinese variant including a 5.5-inch full HD display, a 16MP rear camera, a Snapdragon 430 SoC and an aluminium body. 
HMD Global is expected to launch the international variant of the phone later this month at MWC alongside a new Nokia 3310 and the budget Android Nokia 3 and Nokia 5.
